connector.description: Receive notifications about new issues from Jira.

camel.kamelet.jira-source.jiraUrl.name: camel.kamelet.jira-source.jiraUrl
camel.kamelet.jira-source.jiraUrl.description: The URL of your instance of Jira. Example: http://my_jira.com:8081

camel.kamelet.jira-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.jira-source.password
camel.kamelet.jira-source.password.description: The password or the API Token to access Jira.

camel.kamelet.jira-source.jql.name: camel.kamelet.jira-source.jql
camel.kamelet.jira-source.jql.description: A query to filter issues. Example: project=MyProject
